message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
I'm interested in the product, but $150 is a bit above my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Can you meet me at that price?
I understand that $150 is a bit steep for you, but I'm willing to compromise. I can meet you halfway and offer it to you for $135. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really appreciate the product.
I appreciate the compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'd be willing to pay $125 for the product. Can you meet me at that price?
I'm willing to make one more compromise. I can offer it to you for $130. It's the lowest I'm willing to go, but I think it's still a great deal for the product.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still not sure if I can meet you at $130. I'm willing to pay $115 for the product. Can you consider that price?
